title: After Champ select game crashes, not loading loading screen, nothing at all. no black screen.
body: So I've been having an Issue, I've been all over the boards, I've done the logitech solution, I've removed LoL replay, nothing seems to work. I've repaired the client. What's happening is it's letting me select my champion, and then instead of loading anything, nothing happens. No black screen, no attempted loading screen, absolutely nothing. If I click the Riot Icon in links it asks me to reconnect to the game, but then it keeps doing the same thing. After several attempts, I restart my computer and I get into the game late and everyone hates me.
